html: broken the staff of the wicked/scepters of the rulers. Kingship in its true and divine sense belongs to God, but very early in the history of the world, the wicked gained power from Satan, the king of hell and the prince of the world. When Jesus, the King of kings (Rev. 19:16), comes in clouds of glory at the Second Coming, he will judge those who have possessed the staff and the scepters, and he will reign with glory and truth.
